item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)

...or something like this:

The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.

As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Who we are

Suggested text: Our website address is: http://localhost/Korrect%20Enterprises.

Comments

Suggested text: When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media

Suggested text: If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Cookies

Suggested text: If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Suggested text: Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Who we share your data with

Suggested text: If you request a password reset, your IP address will be included in the reset email.

How long we retain your data

Suggested text: If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

Suggested text: If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where we send your data

Suggested text: Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

item.title: About
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
About Us

The KE is a manufacturing, & trading concern founded by an intelligent, entrepreneurial team of visionaries. The firm is administrated by a management post graduate young energetic, person with experience of 10 years. KE is established in Ahmedabad (India) –one of the best industrial towns In India. With a wealth of experience in the technical & finance sector, we selected fast-moving developing industrial sectors to supply the quality and price orient products. We are manufacturing or supplying the product as per standard applicable to that industry. We are going to accredited by ISO- 9001 & 14000.

We are a solutions-driven supplier & manufacturer for several users worldwide. We work directly with our raw materials manufacturer or supplier and help to supply better their products and in quick supply through higher procurement prices payments in time and knowledge. A high standard of quality is consistently achieved through long standing partnerships with manufactures and supplier, which ensures the finest quality products at competitive pricing all year round, as we believe in building and maintaining mutually beneficial relationships with our people, our partners, and our customers.

We procure the raw materials from the best sources and check thoroughly to deliver the fines quality materials to our customers and back it up with a no questions asked return policy.

  LET’S TALK    

Super Efficient

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet elit do, consectetur adipiscing, sed eiusmod tempor.

 

Deeply Committed

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet elit do, consectetur adipiscing, sed eiusmod tempor.

 

Highly Skilled

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet elit do, consectetur adipiscing, sed eiusmod tempor.

We serve our users by creating a technology house that caters services to various industrial segments, manufacturing facilities, research institutes by supplying innovative and high-quality products and services, as We invest significantly in research & development and we continue to extend our capabilities, our performance and our range of specialty chemical products. We are committed to the safety and development of our people and the communities and societies in which we operate. Our aim is to ensure zero harm to our people and the environment. A high standard of quality is consistently achieved through long standing partnerships with manufactures and supplier, which ensures the finest quality products at competitive pricing all year round. We want all our customer to be one hundred percent satisfied with all our product supplied them. If for any reason there is even a little bit of dis-satisfaction, we urge them to let us know about it immediately. We shall strive to correct the anomaly or replace the goods.

Occupational / Workplace Health and Safety Policy help us preserve the best possible work conditions for our employees. Every employee has a right to feel safe at work. Our company is committed to follow legal standards and create a hazard-free workplace.

 

This equal employment opportunity policy is the pillar of a healthy and productive workplace. Everyone should feel supported and valued to work productively so we are invested in treating everyone with respect and consideration.

 

We promote freedom of expression and open communication. But we expect all employees to follow our code of conduct. They should avoid offending, participating in serious disputes, and disrupting our workplace. We also expect them to foster a well-organized, respectful, and collaborative environment

item.title: Abcool 15
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Abcool 15

Abcool 15 is unique high-performance welding and cutting torch coolant. It is a super cool product to prevent the freeze in the cooling channels. It has low conductivity so; it prevents electrolytic corrosion on the metals of channels. Abcool 15 is a highly efficient torch coolant, a specifically formulated product to provide year-round pump protection for water recirculation and closed loop cooling systems. It extends the life and lowers the maintenance costs of your water-cooled welding systems.

Abcool 15 is a non-toxic, non-combustible, and highly efficient at low temperature. It also provides an efficient working in the long range of temperature. It is a water thin low viscosity product to ensure steady flow rates in the most compact torches and keep the pump, chiller and flow controls operating at maximum performance.

Abcool 15 offers outstanding protection against electro corrosion with an exceptionally low conductivity. It is also highly recommended  for Laser Welding/Cutting, Robotic Welding, Resistance and Spot Welding, etc. Abcool 15 lubricates pump, liner, gasket, and seal, thus extending the time between preventive maintenance. Its Corrosion inhibitors protect iron, steel, aluminum, brass, and copper components.

Abcool 15 is an environmentally friendly torch coolant with nonvolatile product. It also contains algaecide to resist the growth of algae. It prevents the internal mineral deposits and clots. It improves welding quality, consistency and increases the welding speed. Abcool 15 increases the consumable life (torch, pipe, pumps) and reduces the electric consumption. It is most suitable for Abcor-benzel plasma cutting machine.

item.title: Pickling paste for Aluminum Alubright P-1244
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Pickling paste for Aluminum Alubright P-1244

Aluminum pickling paste- Alubright P-1244 is a viscous acidic liquid which has been formulated specifically for removes metallic contamination, light oxide films, soot and weld scale residue, shop soil and other similar contaminants from aluminum surfaces before and after the weld process. It removes grease, grime, dirt, and road film from aluminum, stainless steel, magnesium, and aluminum alloy metals. Leaning and brightening stainless steel and aluminum trim, window frames, storm windows, screening and air conditioning coils

Alubright P-1244 is a strong and concentrated paste formula which acts fast and effectively.

Aluminum brightener and cleaner is superior adhesion to stay where required, even on vertical surface it contains phosphoric acid causes a phosphate coat to form that can serve as a primer for a coat of lacquer or paint. The phosphate coat is a conversion coating with improved adhesive properties. Pickling Agent for Aluminum is used in electroplating and metal processing plants to achieve a perfect and even surface required for the subsequent coating processes.

item.title: Britocln L-1035
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Britocln L-1035
(Aluminum cleaner and brightener)

Aluminum cleaner & Brightener-Britocln L-1035 is a concentrate blend of inorganic acid, surfactants and solvents that clean aluminum and aluminum alloy. It removes concrete on heavy transport vehicles. It is a powerful acidic detergent designed to quickly remove atmospheric corrosion, road grime and soils from all aluminum surfaces. The solution can apply on the surface areas with the help of brush or sprayer prior to welding. This Can also use to clean and restore parts and equipment that have been in service. 

Britocln L-1035 removes oxides, dirt, and grease. It removes instantly heavily encrusted corrosion, rust, calcium, lime, tarnish, grease, oil & water stainsoils from aluminum, aluminum alloy surfaces, stone and cement building materials. Commonly, it uses to deoxidize and brighten transport vans, boat hulls, aluminum sidings and road tankers and remove most industrial fallout from the surface, ensuring a bright white surface to aluminum. The unique surfactant contained in Britocln L-1035 produces a dense, stable foam, which aids in the removal of light oil deposits, grease, and grime, allows the corrosion inhibitor to reduce corrosive, it is also effective in removing grime, algae, scum, lime deposits, water line stains, oxidation, and brightens the aluminum with a true satin shine.

This product requires no brushing or rubbing to clean surfaces. This product works well to clean grime off wheels and extremely dirty truck frames. It is most used on aluminum trailer bodies, aluminum tanks, aluminum bull bars and aluminum dinghies.

Britocln L-1035 also removes soil, years of accumulated fungi, rust and wood stains from fibro, cement, terrazzo tiles and unpolished rock.

Britocln L-1035 works quickly to restore the original luster to the metal. Britocln L-1035 often used to prepare an aluminum surface before welding and to clean off weld scale. Britocln L-1035 can use to brighten mag wheels.

It removes instantly heavily encrusted corrosion, rust, calcium, lime, tarnish, grease, oil & water stainsoils from aluminum, aluminum alloy surfaces, stone and cement building materials. Commonly, it uses to deoxidize and brighten transport vans, boat hulls, aluminum sidings and road tankers and remove most industrial fallout from the surface, ensuring a bright white surface to aluminum. The unique surfactant contained in Britocln L-1035 produces a dense, stable foam, which aids in the removal of light oil deposits, grease, and grime, allows the corrosion inhibitor to reduce corrosive, it is also effective in removing grime, algae, scum, lime deposits, water line stains, oxidation, and brightens the aluminum with a true satin shine.

This product requires no brushing or rubbing to clean surfaces. This product works well to clean grime off wheels and extremely dirty truck frames. It is most used on aluminum trailer bodies, aluminum tanks, aluminum bull bars and aluminum dinghies.

Britocln L-1035 also removes soil, years of accumulated fungi, rust and wood stains from fibro, cement, terrazzo tiles and unpolished rock.

Britocln L-1035 works quickly to restore the original luster to the metal. Britocln L-1035 often used to prepare an aluminum surface before welding and to clean off weld scale. Britocln L-1035 can use to brighten mag wheels.

"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"}],"isInner":false}],"isInner":false}]

item.title: Antspro G-123
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Anti-spatter nozzle dip gel
Antspro G-123

Anti spatter Nozzle Dip Gel-Antspro G-123 is a nontoxic, nonflammable dip gel to protect the M.I.G gun nozzles, contact tips, accessories, and all welding zones during single and multi-pass welding. Its preventions spatter to adheres the sensitive components of welding torches, including the interior and exterior of MIG nozzles, the end, and outer surfaces of contact tips and positional and fixtures.

Anti-spatter nozzle dip Gel is formulated with hot temperature synthetic release agents to provide easy release of spatter, and to prevent clogging in Mig Welding gun nozzles and tips. Nozzle Gel creates an anti-spatter film that will not clog orifices & threads. It eliminates erratic operation. It reduces the brake down period. There are no undesirable fumes and/or odors from this product during the welding process Heat-resistant to withstand hot temperature use, paint compatible, Contains no silicones, no fluorocarbons. The product does not contain silicon so there is no problem of repainting. There is no problem of spillage of the liquid on the floor as material in the paste form and easy to apply. It is use as a protective cover before welding. It is suitable for all type of the weld able metals. Anti-spatter nozzle dip gel can be easily cleaned from the nozzle and contact tip.

item.title: Anti-spatter SL-305
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Anti-spatter synthetic liquid
Anti-spatter SL-305

Anti-spatter (SL-305) contains synthetic release agents to prevent hot spatter from sticking on surface. The Spatter falling on treated area will not adhere & remove with simply brush away. It does not contain depleting chemicals. It is more paintable product in compared with any other product. Anti-Spatter SL-305 contains no flammable ingredients and no odorous solvents; it is a much better choice for applications in enclosed environments.

This anti-spatter provides superb performance at hot temperature applications. This water-based anti-spatter contains a special blend of additives and release agents that provide excellent lubricity and multi-metal corrosion inhibiting properties resulting in higher quality fabrications with less downtime and greater tool life. This anti spatter is biodegradable, nonflammable and not contains any oils, solvents, or harmful chemicals. Anti-spatter does not interfere with weld formations. This Anti-spatter significantly reduces costly labour and downtime for grinding, cleaning and equipment change out. It can apply with a brush, dip, or spray. The unique water-based formula keeps welded surfaces cooler and helps prevent bowing. This anti-spatter contains no silicone to interfere with post-welding treatments such as painting, coating, or plating. Its non-reactive formula provides excellent wetting and lubricity, in torches.

item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.

item.title: Anti-spatter aerosol spray s-201
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Anti-spatter aerosol spray s-201

Anti-spatter aerosol spray s-201 is a high- performance welding anti spatter spray & mold releasing product for all type of welding & plastic, rubber molds. It is a heat stable, non-toxic, odourless, nonstick, product. Aerosol spray forms a smooth film on the metal surface to prevent metal spatter and sludge.

The film of this anti- spatter product is non-migrating, easily removable. Anti-spatter aerosol spray does not allow to build up the spatter on the nozzle tips of MIG and TIG welding.

Direction for use

  • Surface is to be coated, should be clean and degreased. 
  • Shake can for at least one minute before use.
  • Spray from about 20 cms to 30 cms away from surface uniformly around the welding area before welding.
  • Allow product to dry for 10 to 20 seconds. For thick film, it requires more times Spray. Spray aerosol insides of the nozzle’s tips.
  • Ideal for plastic injection molding, blow, molding, & compression molding, also recommended for ABS plastic resin, rubber, Bakelite, polyester, and polystyrenes.
  • Multipurpose mold release and anti-spatter. Ideal for both hot and cold molds. 
  • Faster production cycle due to excellent release properties.
  • Contains special versatile grade of silicon fluid.

Cautions

  • It is a pressurized container so, protects from sun light and do not expose to above 
  • 50° C. Do not spray on hot surface, near naked flame or any source of ignition. Do not 
  • Puncture, drop from hight it can burst violently. Do not breathe vapours. The product is 
  • Not suitable for Paintable surface.
  • Carefully read the instruction & MSDS before use.
  • Manufacturer will not accept any liability or damages causes due to accidental or intentional by use or misuse of this product.

Note: -Korrect Enterprises is also manufacturing Anti-spatter Liquid (L-236), Anti-spatter Liquid (L-397), Anti-Spatter paste (P-345), Anti-spatter emulsion (E-350), Anti-spatter nozzle gel (G-123)
